comment.author: 8648347@N05
comment._content:
I got to this photostream from Wired Magazine. All these images are incredibly moving and isolating. I feel a deep sickness in the pit of my stomach as I fumble through these photographs. 

These are beautiful and sadly far too real.

comment.author: 31259823@N04
comment._content: i, too, came here from wired mag. it's a whole new perspective on zoos....isolated is such a good way to describe the feeling...
